title: Metl 2: The Last Wish
description: Some wishes are granted. Theirs must be earned.Caden may have saved the world from Metl, but the journey to find his father has only just begun. After months of being on the run as fugitives, Caden and Annika arrive at New Darien, a town unlike anything they've seen. The entire population is forced to dig up Iltech from a giant hole, all day every day, while under the watch of a massive robot.Caden and Annika want to avoid New Darien at all costs, but the townspeople beg "King Caden" to help them. Caden doesn't want to be anyone's king, he just wants to find his dad. But perhaps the path to finding him is closer than he thinks.
author: Scott  Wilson
